backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, and CRUD operations for publishers with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing dashboard-related features, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing the purpose of all frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and configuration.
frontend/.env: Environment file specifying the Internet Identity provider URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and OKLCH-based theme variables defining light and dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document bootstrapping the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router configuring authentication flow and all application routes.
frontend/src/components/conductors/Condu: Modal form for creating and editing trained service meeting conductors with publisher lookup and availability fields.
frontend/src/components/conductors/Delet: Confirmation dialog that triggers deletion of a conductor using a mutation and displays a loading state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper providing sidebar, header, routed page content, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Top header bar with menu toggle and logout functionality that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Navigation sidebar with mobile toggle, active-route highlighting, and scrollable nav links.
frontend/src/components/notes/AddGlobalN: Modal for creating or editing a global note with validation, category handling, and publisher attachment.
frontend/src/components/notes/GlobalNote: Displays a note with category badge, preview text, date, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/AddPion: Modal for adding a pioneer by selecting an active publisher and service year, with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/DeleteP: Confirmation dialog to delete a pioneer record using a mutation with success/error feedback.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/EditPio: Provides a modal for editing a pioneer's assigned publisher and service year with validation and update mutation.
frontend/src/components/publicWitnessing: Confirmation dialog that deletes a trained publisher using a mutation and closes on completion.
Modal for creating or editing a trained publisher, including publisher selection, training date, and authorization state.
frontend/src/components/publishers/AddPu: Modal for adding a new publisher with fields for name, group, privileges, and activity status, submitted via mutation.
frontend/src/components/publishers/Delet: Empty file placeholder for a delete-note dialog component.
frontend/src/components/publishers/EditP: Provides a modal to edit publisher details such as name, group, privileges, and activity status using an update mutation.
Empty file placeholder for an edit-note modal component.
frontend/src/components/publishers/Publi: Empty file placeholder for a note display component.
Empty file placeholder for a section displaying publisher notes.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Edit: Modal for editing a shepherding visit with publisher selection, visit date, and elders present, submitted via update mutation.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Reco: Modal for recording a shepherding visit with form validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/tasks/AddTaskMod: Modal for creating a new task with required fields, category selection, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/EditTaskMo: Modal for editing an existing task, preloading task data and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/territories/AddT: Modal to create a territory with number and type validation before submitting.
frontend/src/components/territories/Chec: Table displaying sorted territory checkout history with optional edit actions.
Modal to check out a territory to a selected publisher with optional campaign flag.
frontend/src/components/territories/Dele: Confirmation dialog that deletes a territory note using a mutation and shows toast messages.
frontend/src/components/territories/Edit: Modal for editing a checkout record, including publisher selection and date handling, and saving updates via mutation.
Modal for editing a territory’s number and type with validation and update mutation.
Modal allowing users to edit a territory note’s content and save changes through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Terr: Card component displaying a single territory note with edit and delete controls.
Section to create, list, edit, and delete notes for a territory using related hooks and modals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddPublisher.ts: Mutation hook to add a new publisher, mapping privilege data and invalidating publisher queries on success.
Mutation hook for checking out a territory and invalidating territory-related queries afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateGlobalNote.t: Mutation hook to create a validated global note and refresh global notes queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreatePioneer.ts: Creates a pioneer via actor.createPioneer and invalidates the pioneers query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateShepherdingV: Creates a shepherding visit and invalidates the shepherdingVisits query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTask.ts: Creates a task from mapped params and invalidates all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTerritory.ts: Generates an ID, creates a territory, and invalidates the territories query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTrainedCondu: Creates a trained conductor, invalidates trainedConductors, and shows toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTrainedPubli: Creates a trained publisher, invalidates trainedPublishers, and shows toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteGlobalNote.t: Deletes a global note and invalidates the globalNotes query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePioneer.ts: Deletes a pioneer and invalidates the pioneers query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePublisher.ts: Deletes a publisher with optimistic updates and invalidates the publishers query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTask.ts: Deletes a task and invalidates all tasks queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTrainedCondu: Deletes a trained conductor, invalidates trainedConductors, and shows toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTrainedPubli: Deletes a trained publisher, invalidates trainedPublishers, and shows toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalNotes.ts: Provides queries to fetch all global notes or a single note by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context providing identity, login, logout, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides queries to fetch all publishers or a single publisher by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useShepherdingVisit.t: Fetches, updates, or deletes a single shepherding visit with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Fetches tasks filtered by status or a single task by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritory.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating territory data, including get, update, delete, return, and make-available operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritoryNotes.ts: Implements hooks to fetch, create, update, and delete notes tied to a specific territory with query invalidation.
Fetches all trained service meeting conductors using React Query.
Fetches all trained publishers via a simple React Query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateCheckoutReco: Mutation hook to update a territory checkout record and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateGlobalNote.t: Mutation hook for editing global notes and invalidating the global notes list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePioneer.ts: Updates a pioneer record and invalidates the pioneers query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePublisher.ts: Updates publisher details, maps privilege choices, and refreshes the publishers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTask.ts: Mutation hook to update a task and refresh all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTaskCompleti: Updates a task’s completion status and invalidates all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTrainedCondu: Updates trained conductor records with toast notifications and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTrainedPubli: Updates trained publisher data with success/error toasts and query refresh.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, identity provider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoon.tsx: Simple placeholder page showing a coming-soon notice with an icon and title.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page aggregating publishers, territories, tasks, and visits to display activity stats and recent items.
frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroupProf: Displays details for a specific field service group, including leadership, members, and badges, with loading and invalid-group handling.
frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroups.ts: Lists all field service groups with overseer, assistant, and active publisher summaries, linking to each group’s profile.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Provides the login screen using Internet Identity with a branded UI and loading state.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Manages global notes with category filtering, sorting, add/edit/delete actions, and publisher name resolution.
frontend/src/pages/Pioneers.tsx: Displays, adds, edits, and deletes pioneers in a sortable table with supporting modals.
frontend/src/pages/PublicWitnessing.tsx: Shows trained publishers for public witnessing with sorting, add/edit/delete modals, and authorization status.
frontend/src/pages/PublisherProfile.tsx: Displays a single publisher’s profile with badges, edit/delete actions, and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/Publishers.tsx: Lists all publishers with filters, table display, and add/edit/delete functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceMeetingConduct: Manages trained service meeting conductors with add, edit, delete options and a sortable table.
frontend/src/pages/Shepherding.tsx: Shows shepherding visits with search, sorting, record/edit/delete actions, and navigation to visit profiles.
frontend/src/pages/ShepherdingVisitProfi: Displays details for a single shepherding visit with note editing and delete/edit controls.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks.tsx: Tasks page with filtering, add/edit modals, completion toggling, and delete confirmation using task hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Territories.tsx: List view for territories with status colors, checkout duration logic, row highlighting, and add territory modal.
frontend/src/pages/TerritoryProfile.tsx: Territory detail page supporting editing, deletion, checkout/return actions, and viewing/editing checkout history.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Provides date formatting utilities for various backend timestamp types including tasks, notes, visits, and checkouts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Holds project state describing a dashboard update to add a Recent Activity section listing the five latest shepherding visits. Includes existing features, a pending feature request, and metadata such as schema and project version.
